user_query: My company is organizing a team-building event and we are looking for outdoor activities. Can you provide me with some fun and engaging team-building activities that can be done in a natural setting? It would be great if you could also suggest some locations in our city where we can hold these activities.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of fun and engaging team-building activities suitable for outdoor settings.
Identify and list potential locations in the city that are suitable for holding the outdoor activities.
Combine the list of activities with the list of locations, ensuring each activity includes a recommended location.
